about_the_game:
Embark on a crazy bizarre journey of discovery and conflict -through dreams, and nightmares - in Dreamlander!

Experience a fusion of retro game genres while unfolding the lore of a faded world and trying to restore order across a conquered kingdom.

Explore different worlds, meet memorable characters, and unravel haunting truths as you make your way through the adventure.

Take control of your dreams and nightmares, meet your maker, and decide the fate of a multiverse! What more can you ask for?



Note from the creator:

I really hope you will enjoy Dreamlander. This is, essentially, my retro-game-inspired labor of love. I've been working on this game for nearly 8 years now, and a lot has happened along the way. I've faced several challenges since starting, lost people I loved, and have grown much as an individual. Because of this the game has faced several delays, been changed, and even restarted and rewritten multiple times. I expect Dreamlander to take another year or two to reach completion. My only hope is that when completed, Dreamlander will bring some people as much joy as the games I played as a child brought me.

Thanks for checking out my game.
Brad Donohoo

Embark on a crazy bizarre journey of discovery and conflict -through dreams, and nightmares - in Dreamlander!

Experience a fusion of retro game genres while unfolding the lore of a faded world and trying to restore order across a conquered kingdom.

Explore different worlds, meet memorable characters, and unravel haunting truths as you make your way through the adventure.

Take control of your dreams and nightmares, meet your maker, and decide the fate of a multiverse! What more can you ask for?



Note from the creator:

I really hope you will enjoy Dreamlander. This is, essentially, my retro-game-inspired labor of love. I've been working on this game for nearly 8 years now, and a lot has happened along the way. I've faced several challenges since starting, lost people I loved, and have grown much as an individual. Because of this the game has faced several delays, been changed, and even restarted and rewritten multiple times. I expect Dreamlander to take another year or two to reach completion. My only hope is that when completed, Dreamlander will bring some people as much joy as the games I played as a child brought me.

Thanks for checking out my game.

name: DREAMLANDER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i-5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Welcome to a world of dreams and nightmares! Go on a unique adventure and restore peace to a cursed dream-like world. Explore the lands and make friends & foes in this highly experimental RPG.
